testcase.name: Job Search using Search Link (Go to search) on NHS Jobs Website
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the NHS Jobs website homepage.................................passed When I verify the title of the homepage.....................................passed When I click on the Go to search link.......................................passed And I enter "Nurse" in the search box.......................................passed And I select "Sunderland" from the location dropdown........................passed And I click on the Search button............................................passed Then I should see search results for jobs matching "Nurse" and "Sunderland".passed

testcase.name: Sort NHS Job Search Results by newest Date Posted
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the NHS Jobs website homepage.................................passed When I click on the Go to search link.......................................passed And I enter "Nurse" in the search box.......................................passed And I select "Sunderland" from the location dropdown........................passed And I click on the Search button............................................passed When I choose to sort the results by date posted............................passed Then the search results should be rearranged to display the most recently posted jobs first.passed
